input: Consider the following statements and select the correct answer from the codes given below : Assertion (Q) : Judicial Review is a process to restrain the executive or the legislature from exercising power which may not be sanctioned by the Constitution. Reason (R) : The source of the power of judicial review is Article 13 of the Constitution. Codes :

options.A: Both Q and R are individually true and R is the correct explanation of Q
options.B: Both Q and R are individually true but R is not the correct explanation of Q
options.C: Q is true but R is false
options.D: Q is false but R is true
